title: Canadian home sales rise for seventh straight month in September
text:
Canadian home sales rise for seventh straight month in September

Stock Markets 52 minutes ago (Oct 15, 2019 11:40)

© Reuters. Canadian home sales rise for seventh straight month in September TORONTO, Oct 15 (Reuters) - Canadian homes sales rose 0.6% in September from the previous month, the seventh consecutive month of gains, the Canadian Real Estate Association said on Tuesday. The industry group said actual sales, not seasonally adjusted, rose 15.5% from a year earlier, while the group's Home Price Index was up 1.3% from September last year.

Canadian home sales rise for seventh straight month in September
